thread.title: Lisa Gralnek
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Lisa Gralnek

author: Lisa Gralnek
title: Lisa Gralnek
text: I chose my Saatva because I was overwhelmed by choices at retail and online, and just wanted a mattress that didn't cost a fortune and would fit on a new platform bedframe. I don't even know how I found Saatva, but I chose them because of all the great customer reviews. So, now, a month after sleeping on my queen firm mattress -- I am paying it forward, because while the mattress is great and well-constructed, the pillow top they sent me to make the 'firm' style a bit softer made it perfect, and their customer service from beginning to end has been exceptional. I don't usually write reviews - but since you can't test Saatva's mattresses in a showroom or store - you have to believe what's written... Saatva merits it.
